testimonials.name: Abdoel Samaai
testimonials.content: zulaigah benjamin: she is a very quiet and friendly person. She is a fast learner and is easy to talk to. She is not a person to  make conversation first. She is also kind hearted and is a good person to have as a friend.she knows what she want and is focus.

testimonials.name: Ayesha Galant
testimonials.content: Zulaigah is dedicated and very passionate about her work. Working together makes me motivated to go above and beyond to reach our goals and of course, having fun while doing so

testimonials.name: Waydin Jochem
testimonials.content: Although shes quite shes always offering help and always has a smile on her face

testimonials.name: Inam Nkabi
testimonials.content: Working with Zuaigah is a pleasure.He is good at seeing the big picture in both the areas of database design and data definition. She ability to asses a situation from all angles and see the myriad of potential ramifications of a particular course of action was very helpful. And always lends a helping hand where needed

testimonials.name: Ridhaa Gabier
testimonials.content: Zulaigah is a very hardworking and dedicated person. He doesn't give up as easy as everyone else. Every goal that he has set for himself, he has achieved. His not stopping till he reaches the top. He is a motivation to everyone around him, and his personality makes others not  give up and and reach their full potential
